Script.string: Capital of the Valkyon Federation and bastion of civilization on the continent of Arun.
human, high elf, aman, baraka, castanic, popori, and elin...
...to withstand a menace we could not face alone:
Across the sea on the continent of Shara,
our armies are fighting the argon threat to a standstill...for now.
But the argons aren't the only danger. Not by a long shot...
With our army on the argon front,
monsters on our frontiers have become bold.
and we can't let the home front collapse!
We hope that the fighting spirit of our youth
can make up for the numbers we lack.
Who knows? Maybe you're the next Elleon.
Velik knows we could use one.
